name: Export Tax Relief
title: Lowest Export Taxes
description: In 2018, Panama had one of the lowest taxes on exports, with a value of only 150 in local currency units. This positions Panama as a favorable environment for exporters.

name: Peaceful Panama
title: Minimal Arms Exports
description: In 2019, Panama's arms exports were valued at just 1,000,000 SIPRI trend indicator values, reflecting its minimal involvement in the global arms trade.

name: Healthcare Safety Net
title: Minimal Poverty Impact from Healthcare Costs
description: In 2017, only 0.01% of Panama's population was pushed below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket healthcare expenses, indicating a robust healthcare safety net.
